info.narration:
[ {$0's woes are unfathomably deep.}, {$0 wishes for their grief to be absolved.},
]

specialTipSize.specialTip: When an employee finished work with another Abnormality, $0's Qilphoth counter decreased.
When the Insight work result was good, its Qliphoth counter increased.
Upon finishing Repression work, the Qliphoth counter dropped to 0.
When the Qliphoth Counter reached 0, the hallway the Abnormality was in flooded with water. Employees attempting to traverse the flooded hallway was dealt heavy WHITE damage.
Listening to $0's woes through Absolve work set $0's Qliphoth counter back to full. However, Prudence of the employee who undertook the work was halved for the rest of the day.

etc.param: A : (Narrating) He was but a self-centered, arrogant character. (Stroking mask) I knew so from the start. Disaster follows disaster.
A : (Narrating) One abadoned by the world, I shall serve with death, for I am qualified so. A thirst yet to be quenched approaches.
A : (Narrating) His despair had already seeped deep within his bones, eating at him from the inside out. Though he was always smiling, he loathed himself on the inside.
A: (Narrating) He is but a coward, avoiding his own failures. I cannot forgive him. I'm one who strolls through Heaven or Hell on my own accord with you!
(The one who avoided it all falls)
A : To die is to fall into slumber, nothing else. (Falls)
A : Were sins revealed in my dialogue? (The lights go out)
A : Lord above, no. Help me. Please, deliver me from this pain. (Crushing silence)
You are now incapable of controlling Agent #0. All his focus is on that book. The stageplay starts.

You, lost in the dark and surrounded by silence. Though dawn used to break, it's now but an eternal night. If I could reach you, I would lead you out of this sickening darkness into the radiant light.
